casebody.data:
People ex rel. Bartholomew McMahon v. The Board of Auditors of Wayne County. James II. Pound for the writ. Charles E. Miller against.

Mandamus to refund fine after reversal.

Mandamus was granted to compel the Board of Auditors to refund a fine, the judgment under which it was imposed having been reversed on certiorari, and the fine having been paid to avoid imprisonment.

Mandamus.

Motion submitted and denied June 17.
